00027 #define KVSP_skipChar m_ptr++
00028 #define KVSP_skipNChars(n) m_ptr += n
00029 #define KVSP_backChar m_ptr--
00030 #define KVSP_backNChars(n) m_ptr -= n
00031 
00032 #define KVSP_curCharUnicode (m_ptr->unicode())
00033 #define KVSP_curCharPointer m_ptr
00034 
00035 #define KVSP_curCharIsLetter (m_ptr->isLetter())
00036 #define KVSP_curCharIsNumber (m_ptr->isNumber())
00037 #define KVSP_curCharIsLetterOrNumber (m_ptr->isLetterOrNumber())
00038 #define KVSP_curCharIsFunctionStart (m_ptr->isLetterOrNumber() || (m_ptr->unicode() == '(') || (m_ptr->unicode() == '{') || (m_ptr->unicode() == '$'))
00039 #define KVSP_curCharIsEndOfCommand ((m_ptr->unicode() == ';') || (m_ptr->unicode() == 0) || (m_ptr->unicode() == '\n') || (m_ptr->unicode() == '\r'))
00040 #define KVSP_curCharIsEndOfBuffer (m_ptr->unicode() == 0)
00041 
00042 #define KVSP_setCurCharPointer(_ptr) m_ptr = _ptr
00043 
00044 #define KVSP_ASSERT(_x) if(!(_x))qDebug("WARNING : ASSERT FAILED: (%s) IS FALSE AT %s:%d",#_x,__FILE__,__LINE__);
00045 
00046 
00047 #endif //!_KVI_KVS_PARSER_MACROS_H_
